channel.title: Adding 562 sprities? [Pi 317]
channel.description:
I have downloaded all 562 sprites (well most of it) and i have change the inventory sprite onto one of the 562 one's and this is what i get?... http://i44.tinypic.com/3502zwk.png
and also, some of the sprites such as the friend, ignore, clan button is not in client>sprites? someone told me it might be cache packed.. how would i fix this and my inventory??
